name: Black Bat Down
description:
Made for GGJ 2017

The bat commando is shot down by enemy fire and landed on an alien planet! Around the crashsite, a lot of vicious alien creatures are approaching. Use the supersonic waves to detect them and shoot them to protect yourself.

蝙蝠战士在战斗中被敌军打伤，不得不落在一个陌生星球!然而在落地点周围，有大量的外星生物向他袭来！周围一片漆黑！使用超声波进行探测！战斗吧，战斗到最后一秒！

---Programmation/程序---

Janson/淞淞淞, Denny/戴叔, Proxy Error/大剑

---GameDesign/策划---

Mr. Signal/辛浩然 with the help of Everybody.

---Art/美术---

ProxyError/大剑, Denny/戴叔

---Sound/音效---

Janson/淞淞淞 with resources from 2gei.com
